topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981–1988, Volume VI, Soviet Union, October 1986–January 1989
topic.body: This release, the second of four Soviet bilateral volumes, commences immediately following the dramatic encounter at Reykjavik, on October 10–11, 1986, where U.S. and Soviet leaders propelled the negotiation of the Intermediate-Range Nuclear Forces Treaty and the Strategic Arms Reduction Treaty.
topic.image-description: Book cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981–1988, Volume VI, Soviet Union, October 1986–January 1989
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
